text: Jevha tya kaphiranni apalya manata paksapata bhavanela sthana dile, ani paksapatahi adanipanaca, tevha allahane apalya paigambaravara ani imana rakhanaryanvara apalyatarphe santi avatarita keli, ani imana rakhanaryanna isabhaya (takava) cya gostivara drdharakhale1 ani te ya gostisa patra ani jasta hakkadara hote ani allaha pratyeka gostisa cangalya prakare janato
